summary: The module implements unit tests for Azure Resource Manager (ARM) checks that focus on handling wildcard entities. It defines a helper check class to evaluate ARM resource configurations and a test suite that runs the Checkov scanner to verify that resources using wildcards are processed according to the expected compliance logic.
business_intent: Validate that the infrastructure-as-code scanning tool correctly identifies and handles wildcard specifications in ARM templates, ensuring accurate compliance and security assessments for Azure deployments.
